pages.text: Ubricite Ingot can also be used to create ubricite Armor, which in its entirety is capable of blocking an enemy attack with some chance.

Can be crafted on Lithum Altar, using $(#ea7f17)$(l)40 000 DE$() and following items:$(li)Iron Helmet$(o) [Main]$()$(li)Ubricite Ingot $(o)[x6]$()$(br2)Recovery after full ritual: $(#992032)$(l)800 DRP$()
